Introduction

Takayama Riki, known under his stage name Taki, is a Japanese singer and dancer under HYBE Labels Japan.
He is best known as one of the vocalists of the Japanese boy group &TEAM.

Taki is known for participating in the survival program I-LAND–the same show were ENHYPEN was created. However, Taki was eliminated in episode 10. In 2022, he participated in the survival show "&AUDITION - The Howling -" where he qualified to become a member of the boy group &TEAM.
